Muttonchops Dorryss was a commoner from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Muttonchops was a female gold dwarf with a clean-shaven face, tan skin, and mousy-gray hair. She wore a commoners blouse and a corset.
In the , the city of Baldurs Gate was threatened by the encroaching army of the Cult of the Absolute. The crisis flooded the city with refugees, elevating tensions among its citizens and allowing a new power to take rulership of the city â€“ Lord Gortash. Muttonchops Dorryss eagerly consumed the new lords propaganda from the curbside preachers and from the pages of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette. Augur Harxkellan was a Gortash loyalist whose words attracted a crowd of gawkers in the Lower City. Muttonchops Dorryss was among the loyalist crowd, calling the new lord "Lightbringer Gortash."
